doc.title: Hainanese Boneless Chicken Rice: Who started deboning Chicken?
doc.text: I/PRP wish/VB I/PRP know/VB just/RB who/WP it/PRP was/VBD that/WDT started/VBD this/DT trend/NN of/IN deboning/JJ chicken/NN ?/. It/PRP was/VBD a/DT brilliant/NN move/NN ./. Suddenly/RB you/PRP have/VB another/DT type/NN of/IN chicken/NN rice/NN in/IN the/DT market/NN ./. But/CC then/RB ,/, like/IN any/DT other/JJ great/JJ idea/NN ,/, the/DT copycats/NN stepped/NN in/IN and/CC usurped/VB it/PRP for/IN their/PRP$ own/JJ ./. Now/RB we/PRP do/VBP n't/RB even/RB know/VB who/WP started/VBD the/DT trend/NN ./. Perhaps/RB some/JJ of/IN our/PRP$ more/JJ informed/NN foodies/NNS can/MD enlighten/VB us/PRP on/IN this/DT ?/. This/DT chicken/NN rice/NN is/VBZ NOT/JJ for/IN those/RB who/WP consider/VBZ themselves/IN the/DT religious/NN guardians/NN of/IN the/DT Chicken/NN Rice/NN Code/NN ./. I/PRP am/VBP talking/VBG about/IN people/NNS like/IN my/PRP$ friend/NN VB/NN who/WP insists/VBZ that/IN none/NN of/IN the/DT Chicken/NN Rice/NN in/IN Singapore/NN is/VBZ worth/JJ eating/NN ./. According/VBG to/TO Chicken/NNP Rice/NNP Purists/NN ,/, authentic/JJ Hainanese/NNP Chicken/NNP Rice/NNP Chicken/NN is/VBZ never/RB put/VB into/IN cold/JJ water/NN after/IN cooking/NN and/CC never/RB hung/VB because/IN it/PRP will/MD drain/VB out/IN all/DT the/DT precious/NN juices/NNS ./. Also/IN the/DT Chicken/NN MUST/NN be/VB an/DT Old/NNP Mother/NNP Hen/NN who/WP had/VBD laid/RB eggs/JJ twice/NN ./. No/DT more/NN ,/, no/RB less/JJ ./. The/DT chicken/NN must/MD be/VB served/VBD plain/NN without/IN the/DT drizzling/NN of/IN sauce/NN of/IN any/DT kind/NN ./. To/PRP do/VB it/PRP would/MD be/VB to/TO violate/VB the/DT Hainanese/NNP Chicken/NNP Rice/NNP Code/NNP ./. So/RB given/VBN all/PDT the/DT commandments/NN of/IN the/DT code/NN ,/, this/DT stall/NN does/VBZ not/RB qualify/JJ to/TO call/VBP itself/PRP ``/NNP Hainanese/NNP Chicken/NNP Rice/NNP ''/NNP at/IN all/DT !/. But/CC for/IN those/DT heathen/JJ amongst/NN us/PRP ,/, the/DT pariah/NN of/IN Chicken/NN Rice/NN eaters/NNS ,/, this/DT is/VBZ one/CD pretty/RB shiok/JJ chicken/NN rice/NN ./. The/DT timing/NN of/IN the/DT chicken/NN is/VBZ perfect/JJ ,/, so/IN the/DT flesh/NN is/VBZ still/RB tender/JJ but/CC the/DT bone/NN is/VBZ cooked/VBN right/RB through/IN ./. Being/NN scared/NN of/IN Salmonella/NN food/NN poisoning/NN ,/, I/PRP am/VBP always/RB wary/VB of/IN eating/VBG chicken/NN that/WDT is/VBZ still/RB pink/JJ ./. I/PRP tried/VBD the/DT chicken/NN by/IN itself/PRP without/IN the/DT sauce/NN and/CC it/PRP was/VBD ``/JJ Chickeny/NN ''/IN enough/JJ but/CC not/RB overly/RB so/IN such/JJ that/WDT you/PRP feel/VB like/IN you/PRP are/VBP eating/VBG chicken/NN that/WDT has/VBZ just/RB been/VBN running/VBG around/IN you/PRP in/IN a/DT Kampung/NN ./. -LRB-/. Being/VBG a/DT Hainanese/NNP Chicken/NNP Rice/NNP pariah/NNP ,/, I/PRP actually/RB like/IN my/PRP$ chicken/NN with/IN the/DT yummy/JJ savoury/NN soy/NN sauce/NN that/IN they/PRP drizzle/NN over/IN the/DT chicken/NN ./. To/DT top/JJ off/IN the/DT list/NN of/IN transgressions/NN ,/, might/VB I/PRP just/RB add/VB the/DT final/JJ nail/NN in/IN the/DT coffin/NN ./.
